name: The Secretary's Office of the Global Partnership Initiative (S/GPI) Grant Programs
objective:
Support the foreign assistance goals and objectives of the Department of State, Secretary's Office of the Global Partnership Initiative (S/GPI), as delineated in the FY Bureau Strategic and Resouce Plan and other strategic planning documents.  This program is for all grant awards for the entire fiscal year funded through State/S/GPI.
See individual announcements in www.grants.gov

authorizations.text: 634, The Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, as Amended. Pub. L. 111-161.  U.S.C. § 7015. 634, Department of State, Foreign Operations and Related Programs Appropriations Act.

rules_regulations:
Grants must follow the scope of work and terms and conditions as stated in the grant agreement concluded between grantees and S/GPI.
See individual announcements in www.grants.gov
